name: Jackfruit Chickpea Coconut Stir fry - Fanasachi Bhaji
description: Fanasachi Bhaji / Phanasachi Bhaji - Maharashtrian Jackfruit Brown Chickpea Coconut Stir fry with coconut, sesame, Indian spices. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Side Recipe
recipeIngredient: 15 oz can young green Jackfruit in brine or water ((1 can))
a pinch of asafetida - hing (omit to make gluten-free or use certified gf asafetida)
2  dried red chilies (or use chili flakes to taste)
1 cup cooked or sprouted brown chickpeas (kala chana, or use regular chickpeas)
fresh or shredded coconut for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Grind or blend the spice mix into coarse meal and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Grind or blend the spice mix into coarse meal and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the canned jackfruit. Shred the jackfruit with a processor or fork. I use a food processor. pulse a few times and done. Soak the shredded jackfruit in water for 10 mins while you prep. Drain when ready to use, rinse well and use, esp for the jackfruit in brine.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the canned jackfruit. Shred the jackfruit with a processor or fork. I use a food processor. pulse a few times and done. Soak the shredded jackfruit in water for 10 mins while you prep. Drain when ready to use, rinse well and use, esp for the jackfruit in brine.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. When hot, add the mustard and cumin seeds. Cook until they change color or start to pop. half a minute
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. When hot, add the mustard and cumin seeds. Cook until they change color or start to pop. half a minute

recipeInstructions.text: Add bay leaf, chilies and asafetida and cook for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add bay leaf, chilies and asafetida and cook for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add onion, garlic and cook until translucent. 4 to 5 mins
recipeInstructions.name: Add onion, garlic and cook until translucent. 4 to 5 mins

recipeInstructions.text: Add the coconut spice mix, mix well and roast for 2 minutes or until fragrant and the coconut changes color.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the coconut spice mix, mix well and roast for 2 minutes or until fragrant and the coconut changes color.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the drained and rinsed jackfruit, chickpeas, salt and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the drained and rinsed jackfruit, chickpeas, salt and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/2 cup water, cover and cook for 5 minutes. Reduce heat to medium low and cook for 10 to 15 minutes. Add a splash of water in between if needed. Stir every 5 mins. Taste and adjust salt and spice. Continue to cook until the jackfruit picks up flavor. Serve with dal or curries and garnished with coconut and a dash of lemon.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1/2 cup water, cover and cook for 5 minutes. Reduce heat to medium low and cook for 10 to 15 minutes. Add a splash of water in between if needed. Stir every 5 mins. Taste and adjust salt and spice. Continue to cook until the jackfruit picks up flavor. Serve with dal or curries and garnished with coconut and a dash of lemon.
